errors.email_already_exists: Email is already registered on Wikia
errors.registration_error: We can not complete your registration at this time.
errors.username_already_exists: Someone already has this username. Try a different one!
errors.username_unavailable: Oops, your username can only contain letters and numbers from a single alphabet and must include at least one letter. Please try another name.
errors.username_ip_address: Oops, your username looks like an IP address. Please try another name that includes at least one letter.
errors.username_exceeds_max_length: Oops, your username can't be more than 50 characters.
errors.username_illegal_characters: Oops, your username can only contain letters and numbers from a single alphabet and must include at least one letter. Please try another name.
errors.password_exceeds_max_length: Oops, your password is too long. Please choose a password that's 50 characters or less.
errors.password_equal_name: Your password must be different from your username.
